title: Balambat (union council)
text:
Balambat is a <a href="Union%20councils%20of%20Pakistan">union council</a> in <a href="Lower%20Dir%20District">Lower Dir District</a>, <a href="Khyber%20Pakhtunkhwa">Khyber Pakhtunkhwa</a>, <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>.
<a href="Lower%20Dir%20District">Lower Dir District</a> has 37 union councils with a population of 797,852, according to the 1998 census report. The population growth rate of the Lower Dir District was 3.42% per annum between the 1981 and 1998 censuses.
